description: This file appears to be markdown documentation about 'computed properties' in a JavaScript component framework (likely a Lightning.js component). It includes explanations, code snippets, and links related to defining and using computed properties within components.

methods.name: offset
methods.description: A computed property function that returns the product of `this.index` and 100.

methods.name: bgColor
methods.description: A computed property function that returns 'aqua' if `this.focused` is true, otherwise '#ccc'.
